name: Incoming Call (liv bono)
description:
Your best friend video calls you after finding a strange tunnel in her backyard. A spooky game about social distancing, gardening, and revenge.

This game contains some flashing images.

--

Currently runs on Windows and Android. I can't make any promises for iOS/Mac, sorry! I might try to make that work in the future.

Use the mouse to click your selections, or use 1-9 on your keyboard to select the corresponding option. If you misclick, you can use the arrow keys to undo and redo your choices.

--

Last year I created Incoming Call as a submission to InkJam, a 72-hour jam focused on the use of Ink. You can play the original version created during that weekend here.

This year, I decided to revamp Incoming Call with new art, new dialogue, and new music. I've also incorporated Calico this time around, an Ink engine created by Elliot Herriman.
